item.title: Workshop on reproducible science in R & RStudio
item.description:
Everything (including data, slides and codes) about the workshop on reproducible science I run.

Had fun running a 1-day workshop on reproducible science in R & RStudio for our lab @cefemontpellier. We covered data manip & visualisation w/ #tidyverse, version control w/ Git/GitHub and writing dynamic docs w/ R Markdown
📝 Slides & practicals https://t.co/LJRknr8Kzb 📽️=🇫🇷 pic.twitter.com/uCsm9kH0Hf

— Olivier Gimenez 🖖 (@oaggimenez) March 21, 2021

item.title: R Markdown
item.description:
In our weekly group meeting this morning, I introduced R Markdown a great #rstats tool to write reproducible documents (reports, articles, slides, websites) smoothly mixing text, code, figures and equations in html, word or pdf format.
